ud8.10:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud8.10:2.1: “Dabbassa, bhikkhave, mallaputtassa vehasam abbhuggantva akase antalikkhe pallankena nisiditva tejodhatum samapajjitva vutthahitva parinibbutassa sarirassa jhayamanassa dayhamanassa neva charika pannayittha na masi.
ud8.10:2.2: Seyyathapi nama sappissa va telassa va jhayamanassa dayhamanassa neva charika pannayati na masi;
ud8.10:2.3: evamevam kho, bhikkhave, dabbassa mallaputtassa vehasam abbhuggantva akase antalikkhe pallankena nisiditva tejodhatum samapajjitva vutthahitva parinibbutassa sarirassa jhayamanassa dayhamanassa neva charika pannayittha na masi”ti.
ud8.10:3.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
